title: ETTh2
description: The `ETTh2` subset of the ETT dataset contains hourly data collected from a single transformer. This subset is particularly useful for studying the temperature variations and trends on an hourly basis, enabling the development of models that can predict short-term temperature changes.

forecastTarget.name: OT
forecastTarget.description: Oil Temperature, representing the temperature of the transformer's oil, which is the target variable for forecasting.

futureCovariates.name: HUFL
futureCovariates.description: High Useful Load Forecast, representing the forecasted load at a high level.

futureCovariates.name: HULL
futureCovariates.description: High Useful Load Low, representing the forecasted load at a low level.

futureCovariates.name: LUFL
futureCovariates.description: Medium Useful Load Forecast, representing the forecasted load at a medium level.

futureCovariates.name: LULL
futureCovariates.description: Medium Useful Load Low, representing the forecasted load at a low level.

futureCovariates.name: MUFL
futureCovariates.description: Low Useful Load Forecast, representing the forecasted load at a low level.

futureCovariates.name: MULL
futureCovariates.description: Low Useful Load Low, representing the forecasted load at a low level.
